features: 【Premium Material】RCZONE Khaki shag area rug is super soft and durable, soft to the touch, warm and beautiful, at the same time, it has strong toughness, not shed, not fade and no smell, creating a cozy area for kids and your family, Dense surface that is soft to the touch and piles that feeling like stepping out onto a cloud and shields toes from the cold floor.

【Upgraded Design】The tight weaving process ensures that the floor carpet in this area is not easy to fall off and the edges are not easy to fall apart; non-slip latex particle backing, The anti-slip performance of carpets cannot be ignored; We have consistently researched and developed the anti-slip performance of carpets; The bottom contains dense anti-skid particles, which can hold the floor more firmly.

【Easy to Clean】The khaki area rug make it easier to be used. For daily use, you can effectively clean the grey furry rugs with a vacuum cleaner. If the large area rug is wet, you can dry it with a hair dryer. The washable area rugs can be machine washed, but we recommend that you hand wash the thick comfy rugs so that they last longer. After washing, lay the khaki carpets flat to dry to fluff it.

【More choices】The khaki fluffy rug is available in multiple sizes and colors to suit your needs and styles. Using the plush carpet can avoid the cold and heat. The soft area rugs are suitable for various occasions. You can put the floor carpet in girl and boy rooms, or be used as living room rugs, bedroom rugs, nursery rugs, kids area rugs and dorm room rugs. They are ideal for home decoration.

【Warm Note】The shaggy soft rug adopts a minimalist design and modern style concept, use of simple color to add warmth and elegance to the room of your home, The soft fluffy carpet is available in multiple colors and sizes to suit your different styles and needs, matches an ideal choice for home decoration. NOTE: If you have any questions about khaki area rug, please contact us on time. We will provide you with online consultation and free return service within 24 hours.

RCZONE Plush Shaggy Area Rugs RCZONE Ultra-Luxurious Soft Fluffy Area Rug, Perfect Home Decor. Shag rugs belong in your home. Whether you're decorating your living room or bedroom, a shag area rug can provide an extra dose of cozy. That first step out of the bed in the morning can be a hard one to make when a cold wooden floor awaits you. Ease into the day with a cozy bedroom area rug that gives you a soft spot to land when you jump out of bed.

RCZONE 3x5FT Area Rugs Living Room Note: The vacuum packaging will compress the sponge layer and pile tightly, the sponge and pile need time to recover the fiuffy state, and when the carpet regains fluffy, the crease will gradually fade.

Ultra-Soft The Faux fur large area rug is soft and skin-friendly, which can create acozy area for kid and your family. Safe Materials our rugs are made of 100% non-toxic materials. All our rugs have hypoallergenic properties, which makes it perfect for people with sensitive skin or allergies, Makes it safe for your kids to use. Anti-slip Bottom There’s anti-skid latex dots backing on the bottom of shaggy bedroom rugs, which keeps the area rugs from moving around when people walk by. No Shedding Throw Rugs Unlike others, our tightly weaved velvet surface doesn’t shed easily. The edges of the colourful carpet don’t fall apart easily when in use.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 22, 2024
reviews.reviewText: This rug is great to make a smaller living/hangout room feel really cozy. It is extremely soft but not too slippery when you walk on it with socks. It is not very thick or sturdy but this is to be expected at this price point. This means that you really need to use rug tape to secure it to the floor so it does't bunch up or crease. The Khaki color is good at hiding dirt but still looks bright. It can be a bit tricky to clean but that has not been too much of a problem overall. All in all, love this rug and would highly recommend.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 28, 2024
reviews.reviewText: This rug is so soft! I love the feel of it and so does my daughter! 10/10 recommended to all of my friends and family! I can’t get enough of this rug

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 26, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Adds such a unique look to the living room. It’s super soft and durable against daily use. Would brighten up most any room you would wish to put it in.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 29, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Super Extra Fluffy, Very Soft
reviews.reviewText: This rug has so much fluff that it's hard to clean. The pattern is pretty and the thickness is very nice making it super comfy to walk on.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 4, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Bought this for my daughter's room. It's SO FLUFFY and soft. She wanted to sleep on it the day we got it and said she was comfortable all night. It's surprisingly easy to vacuum. My youngest son spilled a glass of water on it and it didn't go through. I haven't washed it yet, but when I do, I won't put it in the dryer, just air dry and then brush it out.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 31, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Gorgeous rug and doggie approved
reviews.reviewText: This rug is so gorgeous, soft and fluffy. I put this down in my room and came back a few minutes later to find my dog curled up and snoring on the rug. It is so soft on your feet and feels amazing. I haven't needed to wash this yet but from the listing you can wash this in the washer. I love the rug and plan to get another for my son's room. It's been down a couple weeks now and so far no shedding so it is a quality rug

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 30, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Soft and deluxe, your children's room needs this!
reviews.reviewText: This is a great rug for the kid's room! Soft and fuzzy (shag, short) it has a built in cushioning pad. Pictured is the 5 foot by 7 foot rug, which turned out to be a bit big for the space I had. Sorry about that!As you can see, our elderly terrier was VERY interested! The rug is quite colorful. They call it tie dyed, but I'm from the tie dye generation, and tie dye it ain't, but it is definitely pretty! The size is just right for a toddler's or young child's room. The built in padding will do a lot to cushion falls for sure. It is padded enough for children to nap on, which is really convenient! I will be putting this rug in our granddaughter's room, and I know she will just love it!Days later: I can verify that this rug is machine washable. I had to wash it twice because it so completely fills the washer that the first wash did not get all of the dirt. Second wash left it perfect. My washer is a large drum front loading washer.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 21, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars It's colorful and shaggy.
reviews.reviewText: I'll have to find a use for this RCZONE Area Rugs for Living Room somewhere else in the house. It's too shaggy for the room I was going to put it in, not the fault of the rug, just my inability to read. It's very colorful. The colors are all pastels. It's not what I think of when I hear the words tie-dye though. I do like the pattern and it would work well for a bedroom. If it wasn't too big for mine, I'd use it there. I'll find a good use for it somewhere though.
